§ Start-Up Venture

⸺ by Charles Iliya Krempeaux

A **start-up venture**, often just called a **start-up** (or **startup**), is a stage that can come //before// a company is created.

§§ Start-Up Fund-Raising

Although this varies era, per industry, and per person doing the fund-raising, here are some common things that are needed when doing fund-raising:

• [[lite-paper]]
• [[pitch-deck]]
• [[financial-projections]]
• [[product-demo]]
